about_the_game:
Your father is a scientist who recently asked you to meet him in his laboratory, telling you that his life's work has finally paid off. He found something so incredible that you had to be there to witness it first hand. It is time to find out what your father has been working on all his life.

Originally an entry for the ATOM GameJam #2, EXISTANTIAL is a first-person story-driven puzzle game where you are required to cheat in order to progress. Think outside of the box and pay close attention to hints scattered around the environments to break the illusion of existence.


  • Solve unique puzzles that will require you to alter reality
  • Explore a science lab environment filled with clues that will help you uncover the truth behind your existence
  • Discover a story that will eliminate the fourth wall and put your existence inside the game world


* This game uses assets from the Unreal Engine Marketplace.

** Special thanks to SilverTM for the 'Science Laboratory' environment, Jonathon Frederick for the 'Modular SciFi Season 1 Starter Bundle' environment, and Tansu Ergene for the 'Horror Engine' first person game kit.

Your father is a scientist who recently asked you to meet him in his laboratory, telling you that his life's work has finally paid off. He found something so incredible that you had to be there to witness it first hand. It is time to find out what your father has been working on all his life.

Originally an entry for the ATOM GameJam #2, EXISTANTIAL is a first-person story-driven puzzle game where you are required to cheat in order to progress. Think outside of the box and pay close attention to hints scattered around the environments to break the illusion of existence.


  • Solve unique puzzles that will require you to alter reality
  • Explore a science lab environment filled with clues that will help you uncover the truth behind your existence
  • Discover a story that will eliminate the fourth wall and put your existence inside the game world


* This game uses assets from the Unreal Engine Marketplace.

** Special thanks to SilverTM for the 'Science Laboratory' environment, Jonathon Frederick for the 'Modular SciFi Season 1 Starter Bundle' environment, and Tansu Ergene for the 'Horror Engine' first person game kit.
name: EXISTENTIAL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 / Radeon RX 550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5700 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: EXISTENTIAL is a first-person story-driven puzzle game that offers a unique solution that will put your existence into the game world.
